content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
The government tore down my house without paying me any refund.
I am really sorry to hear that. It seems like you' re feeling overwhelmed by the situation and would like to rectify this situation?
I want to be the president so that I can take revenge of the local government and rectify this situation.
I know how hard that can be, but I believe that you are the first to step up to the challenge and do your utmost to help your community. How long have you been living in this house?
